data.description: Extract information out of LiveJournal blogs
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
LiveJournal blogs (and the livejournal RSS feed) are quite
    structured and regular - this module aims to make it easy to extract
    useful information from both feed parsing and HTML-scraping, in a
    unified format with other members of the WWW::Blog::Parse family
